}} {{Flavour|This spell bestows a lethal but temporary gravity field to a crushing implement held by the caster. It will not affect weapons otherwise subject to special enchantments.}} '''Maxwell's Silver Hammer''' was a level 2 [[Transmutations]]/[[Earth Magic]] spell which temporarily granted your equipped non-[[artifact]], unbranded crushing weapon the [[vorpal]] [[brand]]. Crushing weapons include: *[[Club]] *[[Flail]] *[[Great mace]] *[[Giant club]] *[[Hammer]] *[[Mace]] *[[Quarterstaff]] ==History== Maxwell's Silver Hammer was removed in [[0.10]]. ==Trivia== [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maxwell%27s_Silver_Hammer Maxwell's Silver Hammer] is an homage to a Beatles song of the same name about a college student with a hammer and his ensuing killing spree.
